item.title: How to install Coretto JRE 17
item.author: me@prixix.com (Prixix)
item.description: What is Amazon Coretto? Amazon Coretto is a Java runtime environment that is used to run Java applications. It’s built on top of OpenJDK and is available for both Linux and Windows for free. Corretto is Open source, you can get it from here. How to install Coretto JRE 17 on Debian-based Linux First you need to add the repository to your system: wget -O- https://apt.corretto.aws/corretto.key | sudo apt-key add - sudo add-apt-repository 'deb https://apt.
